title: Account Hacked ticket not available
body:
Hello, 

My alternate account was hacked last night while I was in champion select to stop decay, and now I cannot log in to the account nor recover the password since the hacker changed the email associated with the account too. 

I created a support ticket right after the password and email was changed, but I cannot access the ticket since you are required to be logged out for account recovery tickets. ("For security reasons, you must be signed out to submit this type of ticket.")

replies.body: It's okay if you cannot access the ticket center, we can still correspond through email.  I've confirmed that your ticket has been received and escalated to our account team.  A specialist will review the situation and respond, which is when you will receive an email that you can reply to.  We'll respond to the ticket as soon as we can!  In the meantime, I suggest using our[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to update your security in and outside of League.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thanks, I appreciate it. I've made sure to scan for viruses before attempting any more logins and my computer is clean.
